full_text:
Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 76316.054 Date: 7/23/19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
1:40 AM Inmate Brought Down to Suicide Cell #4 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
1:45 AM Inmate lying on BED
2 AM Inmate Sitting on Bed talking
2:15 AM (b)(7)(A)
2:30 AM Inmate Sitting on bed trying to remember what happen
2:45 AM Inmate Sitting on BED
3:00 AM Inmate Sitting on BED
3:15 AM (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) takes pictures of Inmate
3:30 AM Inmate Sitting on BED
3:45 AM Inmate Sitting on BED
4:00 AM Inmate Sitting on BED
4:15 AM Inmate Sitting on BED
4:30 AM Inmate Standing at Door talking
4:45 AM Inmate Standing at Door talking
5:00 AM Inmate Sitting on BED
5:15 AM Inmate Standing at Door
5:30 AM Inmate Standing at Door
5:45 AM Inmate Standing at Door
6:00 AM Inmate Standing at Door

Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten observations of an inmate on suicide watch. The observations are recorded at regular intervals, and the document includes a note to observers to legibly print and sign their name at the beginning of their shift. Some information is redacted, indicated by (b)(6); (b)(7)(A); (b)(7)(C).
